content: > you can find the free version of this > pattern on my blog here 1 this > downloadable pdf contains the full > pattern in one ad-free printable > file leto shawl is a geometric lace pattern which is made from top down starting from the middle of top edge the shawl is constructed by two symmetrical sides mirrored over the center stitch this shawl is a masterpiece and easier than it looks it s a lightweight accessory and perfect addiction to any wardrobe leto shawl is great project for those of you looking to expand your crochet skills not quite mindless project but simple enough that it becomes rhythmic the pattern contains both written instruction and chart tested choose the most comfortable way to follow the pattern **materials & tools ** 1 yarn rico design creative cotton degrade 200g = 800 meters 50% cotton 50% acrylic 1 cake 2 hook size 3 5mm us e/4 uk 9 adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge 3 tapestry needle to weave and hide yarn ends 4 scissors 5 1 stitch marker **level intermediate ** **size after blocking ** wingspan - 170cm center depth - 74cm **gauge after blocking ** after row 9 the triangle is approx 10cm/4in high gauge is not crucial for this project however changes might result in a different yardage requirements and the finished size **multi-item discounts** 1 use code **3items** get 15% off when you have 3 items in your cart 2 use code **4items** enjoy 20% off your entire order with 4 items in your cart 3 use code **5items** indulge in a 25% discount when you add 5 items to your cart 4 use code **6items** for the ultimate savings enjoy a whopping 40% off when you have 6 or more items in your cart > subscribe to my newsletter 2 and be > the first to know about new patterns > and design tutorials and more > > join my facebook group 3 and > official ravelry group 4 where you > can find necessary support you can > ask questions or share your finished > projects > > you can also follow my instagram 5 > facebook page 6 and pinterest 7 1 https //mycrochetory com/leto-shawl-week-1/ 2 https //mycrochetory us19 list-manage com/subscribe u=c0df7483341179616a560ff5a&id=da5321fe6c 3 https //www facebook com/groups/939060686484870/ source_id=381840245571840 4 https //www ravelry com/groups/mycrochetory-designs 5 https //www instagram com/mycrochetory/ hl=pl 6 https //www facebook com/mycrochetory/ ref=aymt_homepage_panel&eid=ardf_cwil9km8fcuwcettlgrhjotvx90e0zk15g4vcnijlqk0s54ur7jmqxxmptq0hwfpvjdve6mruan 7 https //pl pinterest com/mycrochetory/
